mapper.select: SELECT folder_id FROM note_folder WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND parent_folder_id IS NULL

SELECT s.script_id AS scriptId, s.title, sp.paragraph_content AS paragraphContent, nfo.folder_name AS folderName FROM script s INNER JOIN script_paragraph sp ON s.script_id = sp.script_id INNER JOIN note_file nfl ON s.file_id = nfl.file_id INNER JOIN note_folder nfo ON nfl.folder_id = nfo.folder_id WHERE s.user_id = #{userId} AND sp.paragraph_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') GROUP BY s.script_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO note_file (user_id, folder_id, category_id, file_name, is_important) VALUES (#{userId}, #{folderId}, #{categoryId}, #{fileName}, #{isImportant})
INSERT INTO note_folder (user_id, parent_folder_id, folder_name) VALUES (#{userId}, #{parentFolderId}, #{folderName})
